game.title: Defenders Of The Realm
game.description: What is this game all about? - Flexible strategy, ever changing tactics to counter enemies In the game, there are a variety of traps for players to choose from; they only have one function, which is to kill enemies. When wearing VR and experiencing the game in person, only then can you feel the power of the traps. The variety of traps in the game is enough to make the smartest players create ever-changing designs. - Relentless killing; shocking first person perspective experience For a tower defense type game, the perspective of the VR brings an unprecedented thrilling experience to the players; the Goblin scout that runs straight at you, making it difficult for you to aim; while ruthless traps are killing enemies and shots are coming from crossbows, brutal, tall, aggressive barbarians just stand majestically in front of you! VR gives a different experience to tower defense games.
